title: Over 3-hour power cut today: PUCSL
body_lines: Electricity regulator, the Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) has given approval to the Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) request to enforce a three hour and 20-minute power cut today.
As per the PUCSL, a two-hour power cut will be enforced between 9.00 a.m. and 5.00 p.m. whilst a one hour and 20-minute power outage will be imposed between 5.00 p.m. and 9.00 p.m.
Area CC will experience a straight three-hour power disruption from 6.00 a.m. to 9.00 a.m.
